VII.i.3.C.1.a
.
Requirement That a Child Be Unmarried
Under
38 CFR 3.57
, a person must be unmarried to qualify as a child for Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) purposes.  Therefore, a person of any age who marries ceases to be a child for VA purposes.
title: M21-1, Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section C - Marriage of a Child
citation: Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section C
